From: Freeda C., To: Ruby Chandler Mailed From: Milford, Illinois on July 24, 1911 Picture Info: Public School, Milford, Ill. Pub. by C.C. Campbell

Ruby Chandler Pearl, Illinois

Well, I'm home. But I sure was tired when I arrived here. But I am well rested up today. Did Marie find her money? I felt so sorry for her. Ruby write me soon. Freeda C.
